test.instr: (:ins (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X closet))) (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X plant))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X cup))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X yellow) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X green) (sort Y cupboard)))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X couch)))) )
test.nl: There is a bottle in the refrigerator. The door of the closet is closed. Open the door of the cupboard. Go to the plant. Pick up a cup. Put the yellow can in the refrigerator. The green can must be in the cupboard. Do not go to the couch.
